title: theCURVYcon 2016
desc: theCURVYcon ?is back for 2016! This year we've got two days of jam-packed events, panels and of course-- shopping! 2015 guests included: Amber Riley, Kierra Sheard, Gabi Gregg, Nadia Abhoulson, Ashley Graham and soooo many more. 2016 promises to be bigger and better, we are so excited! There are three types of tickets available: ? General Admission For the curvy girl on a budget includes free theCURVYcon tote bag Teal Level Ticket For the curvy girl who loves swag & free products?  includes free theCURVYcon tote bag, special gifts from our sponsors Platinum Level Ticket (LIMITED QUANTITY) For the curvy girl who loves swag, hates lines & wants extra event perks? includes theCURVYcon tote bag, special gifts from our sponsors, reserved seating, meet and greets ? What:? theCURVYcon When:? June 17th and 18th, 2016 Where:? Metropolitan?Pavillon?West in New York City *Tickets are non-refundable. ? FAQs ? Are there ID requirements or an age limit to enter the event? All Ages are Welcome :-) ? Is my registration/ticket transferrable? Yes Can I update my registration information? No, please give the name on your ticket. Do I have to bring my printed ticket to the event? You can print your ticket or use your phone? What is the refund policy? All ticket sales are final. No refunds. If I can't attend, Can I still get my gift bag? Will you Mail it to me? You must be present on the day of the event to collect your gift bag.
